attributes.action: act to force local authorityies to use CCTV to monitor popular fly tipping spots and to penalise those caught fly tipping
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Act to force local authorities to use CCTV to monitor popular fly tipping spots and to penalise those caught fly tipping. I travel between Newport and Cardiff daily and every day more and more refuse is left on the side of the road. The local authorities do not seem to take this matter seriously. I believe simple web cams could be used to catch the people commiting this crime against society.
